titleStmt.title: The armyng of a Christen warrier readie to fyghte with the enemies of our captain and sauioure Iesus Christe to the whiche soldiers, Henry Barret the writer of this rude boke, wisheth health [and] muche increase of faith.
titleStmt.author: Barrett, Henry, 16th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the house of T. Berthelet],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
